title: forced repair
body:
ever since kayn came out, ive experienced nothing but forced repairing. it has repaired and repaired and repaired over and over again. 2 days ago (as well as today) it has forced me to repair and as soon as it finished it bug splat again and I had to send yet another crash crash report and honestly if this keeps happening more than likely riot will end up perma banning my account even though its not my fault. every time it happens I send a crash report but that doesn't help anything at all. yes ive tried reinstalling. I even factory reset my pc to see if that would work. but nope..nothing. didn't work and now I'm being punished every day. and then to throw more salt on an open wound, it force repair will stop at 3525 and then stay there for like 5 mins before it keeps going and then it will start going again and then stop. then after it stops at 35mb of data left for 5 mins..it will then do a scan of all the game files yet again. this problem needs to be resolved asap.

Crash Report #172268649

Thank you for reporting your crash with BugSplat! Crash reports help us to identify new issues, and fix them more effectively.

replies.body: Hello can u tell me did u fix it if u did how becouse I have the same issue now. :(

Sorry for the trouble you've been going through, it really seems like whatever is corrupted isn't fixing itself.  :(  The report helps out our QA teams a lot, but won't really resolve your issue.  In this case, make sure to go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide in case there might be other factors causing this.

I also recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and doing an outright clean reinstall for brand new files.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if these steps help!
